author: Football Italia staff
title: Cellino: 'Season is already ruined'
description: Brescia President Massimo Cellino warns they won’t play “unless there are guarantees over safety, and currently we do not have those. The season is already ruined.”
content:
Brescia President Massimo Cellino warns they won’t play “unless there are guarantees over safety, and currently we do not have those. The season is already ruined.”
